channel.title: Payments – Banking, Loans, Credit Cards | iBank & Co.

item.title: Can Payments Data Help Bridge the Tax Gap?
item.dc:creator: wesbowen
item.description: As the way we exchange value changes, taxation faces a pivotal moment. Historically speaking, taxes have been taxing. But new developments in the payments ecosystem - Open Banking, ISO 20022 - are about to change all that.

item.title: Open Banking – Where Partnerships are Required
item.dc:creator: wesbowen
item.description: Open Banking requires and depends on partnerships - from suppliers to business collaborators and from vendors to customers. Banks have to build an ecosystem of alliances.
item.content:encoded:

Customer Experience

One of the top reasons why individuals apply for payday loans is that they cannot pay their rent on time or are way behind. This problem became more apparent when the pandemic hit, withÂ 9.9 million AmericansÂ failing to cover rent expenses on time. item.title: Request to Pay – a Growing Global Trend in Payments
item.dc:creator: wesbowen
item.description: Organisations including banks, fintechs, and payment providers who want to play a leading role in tomorrowâs payment services ecosystem will need to be smart and start identifying their roles in the RtP ecosystem today.
